channel.title: [PI] 1 ip for Christmas Event
channel.description:
[Pi] I've ran into a problem of players doing the Christmas event then transferring it to other accounts. How can I make it so you can only do the event on the IP one time?
Please and thanks.

item.title: [PI] 1 ip for Christmas Event
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Make them not able to trade on the same IP.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] 1 ip for Christmas Event
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“diggy, post:1, topic:425460”][Pi]
I’ve ran into a problem of players doing the Christmas event then transferring it to other accounts. How can I make it so you can only do the event on the IP one time?

Please and thanks.[/quote]

That wouldn’t really stop anybody. The best that you could do is make the event long enough so that people wouldn’t want to do it more than a few times (like the usual).

Or elaborate the registration process (ie. register, unique emails, go through tutorial island, etc)

Read full topic
